MonsterTrait.Name: Innate Spellcasting
MonsterTrait.Text:
The nilbog’s innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
At will: mage hand, Tasha’s hideous laughter, vicious mockery 1/day: confusion

MonsterTrait.Name: Nilbogism
MonsterTrait.Text: Any creature that attempts to damage the nilbog must first succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or be charmed until the end of the creature’s next turn. A creature charmed in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can’t regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

MonsterTrait.Name: Nimble Escape
MonsterTrait.Text: The nilbog can take the Disengage or Hide action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

MonsterAction.Name: Fool's Scepter
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d6+2) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Reversal of Fortune
MonsterAction.Text: In response to another creature dealing damage to the nilbog, the nilbog reduces the damage to 0 and regains 1d6 hit points.
